info.name: Minimal Teal on Dark
info.description: Clears out the cruft on thesaurus.com, light on dark. Edit the values in the filter rule on html to change the color and feel. This is aggressive about cutting everything out except the most basic thesaurus info. No example sentences, no "try these synonyms in your sentence widget" and of course no quiz, no word of the day, etc. Last updated May 2021.
info.additionalInfo:
Note that I might not have caught all the ads since I'm using an ad blocker anyway (uBlock Origin).

It's not set up to work on the homepage, only individual word pages.

This could stop working at any time, because the site uses programmatically-generated class names that may change.
